title: Ascending Weakness Raddle

title: Visual Pathway Raddle
clue1: A homonymous {W} localizes posterior to the optic chiasm, often involving this lobe.
clue2: Primary visual cortex in the {W} lobe lies along this sulcus: ____.
clue3: Lesions sparing the occipital pole can cause {W} cortex injury with ____ sparing.
